wikipedia_page.main: Stephen McGuire (born 18 August 1984) is a Scottish Boccia player.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2012 Summer Paralympics

response: He won a gold medal in Boccia at the 2010 Asian Para Games.IPC bio  He is assured a medal at the 2012 Summer Paralympics after defeating Stephen McGuire 12–0. McGuire complimented his playing, saying of Zheng "He has got so much power, he played really great. In the end I couldn't compete with his power and this was my toughest match of the competition."The Daily Telegraph
